features.title: Chunk Management
features.desc: You can now manage chunks in your Immutable devices, view the amount of data in each of the chunks, delete chunks, and export a chunk directly to TagoIO Files!

features.title: Better Resource Allocation
features.desc: Allocating your services between your profiles is now easier, as you can refer to your daily usage statistics from the current and previous month when editing!

features.title: Manage Mutable Devices' Data
features.desc: Editing and deleting data records in your Mutable devices can now be done directly on Admin!
